articles.author: Matt Roller
articles.title: 'Spiritual leader' Stokes on target to make England XI against South Africa - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Stokes spoke at length to the team after the Afghanistan loss, and England are hoping it spurs the team on, like at last year's T20 World Cup
articles.content:

articles.author: F1
articles.title: Patrick Mahomes, Travis Kelce, Anthony Joshua and Rory McIlroy among host of sports stars to join Alpine’s investor group - Formula 1
articles.description: Alpine and Otro Capital have welcomed some of the world's biggest sports stars as new strategic investors into their €200m fund, including Patrick Mahomes, Travis Kelce, Rory McIlroy, and Anthony Joshua.
articles.content: Alpine and Otro Capital have welcomed some of the world's biggest sports stars as new strategic investors into their 200m fund, including Patrick Mahomes, Travis Kelce, Rory McIlroy, and Anthony Josh… [+3759 chars]
